special.causesStatus: Targets hit by this attack suffer {status}
special.ignoreResistance: Damage dealt by this attack ignores Resistance.
special.targetsMDef: This attack targets Magic Defense instead of Defense.

corrosiveStatus.description: Deal damage to enemies suffering from a particular status.

crushingAdvantage.description: Fill or empty clocks without having to perform checks.
crushingAdvantage.name: Crushing Advantage

partRegeneration.description: Recover from status effects and summon reinforcements when you enter Crisis.

normalAttackMpRecovery.name: Normal Attack MP Recovery
normalAttackMpRecovery.specialText: When this attack hits one or more targets, you recover {amount} MP.

normalAttackStatus.name: Normal Attack Status

oneImmunityExceptPhysical.description: Gain an additional Immunity to any damage type except physical.
oneImmunityExceptPhysical.name: One Immunity

strongAttackMagic.description: Strong Attack targets M.DEF instead of DEF
strongAttackMagic.name: Magical Strong Attack

twoResistances.description: Gain two additional resistances to any damage.
twoResistances.name: Two Additional Resistances

twoResistancesExceptPhysical.description: Gain two additional resistances to any damage type except physical.
twoResistancesExceptPhysical.name: Two Resistances

finalDetonation.name: Final Detonation
finalDetonation.ruleText:
Quick Assembly Rules Preview V2 p17.

finalRestore.description: Restore resources to your enemies when you get taken out.
finalRestore.name: Final Restore
finalRestore.ruleText:
Quick Assembly Rules Preview V2 p17.
Chosen resource: {resource}

painfulMiss.description: Deal damage to yourself or allies when you miss with your attacks.
painfulMiss.name: Painful Miss

ally.label: Your Allies
ally.rule: One of your allies chosen at random

painfulMiss.ruleText:
Quick Assembly Rules Preview V2 p17.
Chosen Attack: {attack}
Chosen Target: {target}

badTemper.description: Gain almost total status effect immunity while in Crisis.
badTemper.name: Bad Temper

collapse.description: Fill a Clock when Strong Attack misses, deal damage when the clock fills.
collapse.name: Collapse

crush.description: Grapple enemies, deal damage to grappled enemies without having to perform a check.
crush.name: Crush

enhancingGuard.description: Deal more damage and ignore resistances after guarding.
enhancingGuard.name: Enhancing Guard

soreLoser.description: Sometimes cause status effects after you fail an Opposed Check.
soreLoser.name: Sore Loser

specialArmor.description: While in Crisis, take less damage from a specific type of Actions.
specialArmor.name: Special Armor
specialArmor.ruleText:
Quick Assembly Rules Preview V2 p4
Action type: {type}

spells.description: Gain access to two different spells using 【MIG + WLP】 for casting.
spells.name: Spells

statusImmunities.description: Gain immunity to two of the following: Poisoned, Shaken, Slow
statusImmunities.name: Status Immunities

steadyRecovery.description: Recover from status effects under certain circumstances.
steadyRecovery.name: Steady Recovery

strongAttackRanged.description: Strong Attack becomes ranged and causes status effects.
strongAttackRanged.name: Ranged Strong Attack

vengefulAttack.description: Use one last Strong Attack after suffering lethal damage.
vengefulAttack.name: Vengeful Attack

ambush.description: Upgrade one specific attribute dice during the first round of conflict.

ambush.ruleText:
Quick Assembly Rules Preview V2 p7

elusive.description: Negate damage while not suffering from status effects.
elusive.name: Elusive

emergencyCamouflage.description: Become invisible for a short time upon entering Crisis.
emergencyCamouflage.name: Emergency Camouflage

extraDamage.description: Deal more damage with this attack when a certain condition is fulfilled.
extraDamage.multipleStatuses: suffer from two or more status effect
extraDamage.name: Extra Damage
extraDamage.specialText: This attack deals 5 extra damage against creatures that {condition}.
extraDamage.specificStatusLabel: suffer from a specific status effect
extraDamage.spell: are affected by one of more spells with a duration of "Scene"
extraDamage.turnTaken: have already taken their turn during this round

falseSenseOfSecurity.description: Turn your allies' failures to your advantage.
falseSenseOfSecurity.name: False Sense of Security

huntersBait.name: Hunter's Bait
huntersBait.ruleText:
Quick Assembly Rules Preview V2 p7
Chosen Action: {action}

lifeSteal.description: Recover HP when dealing damage with this attack.
lifeSteal.name: Life Steal
lifeSteal.specialText: If this attack causes one or more creatures to lose Hit Points, this NPC recovers an amount of Hit Points equal to half the total Hit Points lost this way.

lightningFast.description: Deal more damage during another creature's turn, when not affected by status effects.
lightningFast.name: Lightning Fast

opportunist.description: Improve critical chance during Opposed Checks under certain conditions.
opportunist.name: Opportunist

specialResistance.description: Resist damage dealt by effects with a certain number of targets
specialResistance.name: Special Resistance
specialResistance.ruleText:
Quick Assembly Rules Preview V2 p6
Effective against effects targeting: {targets}

spells.description: Gain access to two different spells using 【INS + WLP】 for casting.
spells.name: Spells

strongAttack.description: Gain a strong attack that deals massive damage to multiple targets but costs you your next turn.
strongAttack.name: Strong Attack
strongAttack.special: After using this attack the NPC cannot perform any actions or free attacks until the end of its next turn.

targetLock.description: Guard to select enemy, deal more damage to selected enemy.
targetLock.name: Target Lock

baselineOneSpellMpBonus.description: Choose one spell from a basic spell list and gain +10 MP.
baselineOneSpellMpBonus.name: One Spell and Bonus MP (Basic)

baselineTwoSpells.description: Choose two spells from a basic spell list.
baselineTwoSpells.name: Two Spells (Basic)

collateralDamage.description: Deal damage when using the Hinder action.
collateralDamage.name: Collateral Damage
collateralDamage.ruleText:
Quick Assembly Rules Preview V2 p8
Chosen damage type: {damageType}

elementDrain.description: Restore MP when hit by elemental damage.
elementDrain.name: Element Drain

elementShift.description: Change your affinities by casting spells.
elementShift.name: Element Shift

magicalMastery.description: Improved ability to interact with clocks related to magic.
magicalMastery.name: Magical Mastery

normalAttackVolatile.description: Normal Attack causes hit targets to become volatile.
normalAttackVolatile.name: Normal Attack Volatile
normalAttackVolatile.specialText: Volatile: Quick Assembly Rules Preview V2 p9

oneSpellMpBonus.description: Choose one spell from an advanced spell list and gain +10 MP.
oneSpellMpBonus.name: One Spell and Bonus MP (Advanced)

overwhelm.description: Improve critical chance during Opposed Checks under certain conditions.
overwhelm.name: Overwhelm

soulburst.description: Other creatures recover MP when you are reduced to 0 HP.
soulburst.name: Soul Burst

spells.description: Choose spells from an advanced spell list. Either choose two spells or one spell and gain +10 MP.
spells.name: More Spells

statusImmunities.description: Gain immunity to two of the following: Dazed, Enraged, Poisoned, Shaken
statusImmunities.name: Status Immunities

twoSpells.description: Choose two spells from an advanced spell list.
twoSpells.name: Two Spells (Advanced)

accuracyCheckBonus.description: Gain a +3 bonus to accuracy checks.
accuracyCheckBonus.name: Bonus to Accuracy Checks

auraOfUnease.description: Enemies cannot recover from chosen status effects.
auraOfUnease.name: Aura of Unease
auraOfUnease.ruleText:
Quick Assembly Rules Preview V2 p10
Chosen status effects: {status1} and {status2}

cruelHypnosis.name: Cruel Hypnosis
cruelHypnosis.ruleText:
Quick Assembly Rules Preview V2 p11
Chosen status effect: {status}

entangle.description: Prevent enemies from performing free attack if they are suffering from multiple status effects.
entangle.name: Entangle

exhaustingCompromise.description: Spend MP to manipulate clocks in certain circumstances.
exhaustingCompromise.name: Exhausting Compromise

hinderingSpecialist.description: Follow up a successful Hinder action with another Hinder.
hinderingSpecialist.name: Hindering Specialist

magicCheckBonus.description: Gain a +3 bonus to magic checks.
magicCheckBonus.name: Bonus to Magic Checks

normalAttackDrainMp.name: Drain MP
normalAttackDrainMp.specialText: Each target hit loses a minor amount of MP.

normalAttackStatus.description: Cause a status effect on hit. Choosing Enraged or Poisoned costs another vulnerability.
normalAttackStatus.name: Cause Status Effect

partingGift.description: Detonate your Weaken spells when you are taken out.
partingGift.name: Parting Gift

secretTechnique.description: Use an attack or a spell without anyone but the target noticing.
secretTechnique.name: Secret Technique

shadowOfDoubt.description: Prevent PCs from invoking Traits and Bonds under certain circumstances.
shadowOfDoubt.name: Shadow of Doubt

spell.description: Gain a spell from a list focused on disruption. Also gain +10 MP.
spell.name: Spell

strongAttack.description: Gain a Strong Attack with debilitating debuffs.
strongAttack.name: Strong Attack

oneSpecial.description: Add one special effect to the Strong Attack.
oneSpecial.name: One Special Effect

twoSpecials.description: Add two special effects to the Strong Attack.
twoSpecials.name: Two Special Effects

strongAttackBlockAction.description: Block hit targets from taking a certain action.
strongAttackBlockAction.name: Block Action
strongAttackBlockAction.specialText: The target cannot take {action} Action until the end of their next turn.

strongAttackBlockAllyVision.description: Hit targets can't see your allies.
strongAttackBlockAllyVision.name: Block Vision on Allies
strongAttackBlockAllyVision.specialText: The target cannot see this NPC's allies until the end of their next turn.

strongAttackBlockFreeAttacks.description: Block hit targets from performing Free Attacks.
strongAttackBlockFreeAttacks.name: Block Free Attacks
strongAttackBlockFreeAttacks.specialText: The target cannot perform Free Attacks until the end of their next turn.

strongAttackBlockHpRecovery.description: Block HP recovery of hit targets.
strongAttackBlockHpRecovery.name: Block HP Recovery
strongAttackBlockHpRecovery.specialText: The target cannot recover HP until the end of their next turn.

strongAttackBlockMpRecovery.description: Block MP recovery of hit targets.
strongAttackBlockMpRecovery.name: Block MP Recovery
strongAttackBlockMpRecovery.specialText: The target cannot recover MP until the end of their next turn.

strongAttackBlockSelfVision.name: Block Vision on Self
strongAttackBlockSelfVision.specialText: The target cannot see this NPC until the end of their next turn.

strongAttackStripResAndImm.description: Hit targets lose resistances and immunities.
strongAttackStripResAndImm.name: Strip Resistances and Immunities
strongAttackStripResAndImm.specialText: The target loses all Resistances and Immunities and cannot gain them until the end of their next turn.

description.twoActions: Retaliate against two types of offensive action.

description.oneType: Use MP to grant yourself and allies Resistance to a specific damage type.
description.twoTypes: Use MP to grant yourself and allies Resistance to two damage types.

intercept.description: Protect your allies from danger by sacrificing yourself.
intercept.name: Intercept

normalAttackStatus.specialText: Each target hit by this attack suffers {status}.

reassuringAura.name: Reassuring Aura

reduceProgress.name: Reduce Progress
reduceProgress.ruleText:
Quick Assembly Rules Preview V2 p13
Chosen status effects: {status1} and {status2}

spell.description: Learn one spell from a list focused on mitigation. Also increase MP by +10.
spell.name: Spell

strongAttackDispel.description: Under certain circumstance remove ongoing magical effects on hit.
strongAttackDispel.name: Strong Attack Dispel
strongAttackDispel.specialText: If a target is suffering from {status} and is affected by one or more spells with a duration of "Scene", that target is no longer affected by any of those spells.

unwaveringSupport.description: Support Villains by improving their critical chance when they invoke Traits.
unwaveringSupport.name: Unwavering Support

vulnerabilityBlock.description: Flip a single Vulnerability of a specific ally to Resistance.
vulnerabilityBlock.name: Vulnerability Block

advise.description: Use MP to help allies recover from status effects and give them a bonus on their next Check.
advise.name: Advise

followUpAttack.description: Under certain circumstances follow up an ally's attack with an attack of your own.
followUpAttack.name: Follow-up Attack

improvedAdvise.actionText: Improved Advise: Quick Assembly Rules Preview V2 p14 & p15
improvedAdvise.description: Improves Advise to allow recovery from all status effects.
improvedAdvise.name: Improved Advise

inspire.actionText:
Quick Assembly Rules Preview V2 p14
Chosen resource: {resource}
Chosen attribute: {attribute}
inspire.description: Use MP to recover an ally's resource and improve one of their attributes.
inspire.name: Inspire

mpBattery.description: Pay MP costs for your allies.
mpBattery.name: MP Battery

oneLastCommand.description: Use one of your special actions one final time when you get taken out.
oneLastCommand.name: One Last Command

oneSpellMpBonus.description: Choose one spell from a list focused on support. Also gain +10 MP.
oneSpellMpBonus.name: One Spell and MP Bonus

strategicCommand.description: Use MP to have an ally take their turn immediately after yours and give them a bonus to damage.
strategicCommand.name: Strategic Command

twoSpells.description: Choose two spells from a list focused on support.
twoSpells.name: Two Spells

vulnerabilityBlock.description: Flip a single Vulnerability of a specific ally to Resistance.
vulnerabilityBlock.name: Vulnerability Block

opposedCheckBonus.description: Gain a bonus to specific Opposed Checks.
opposedCheckBonus.name: Bonus to Opposed Checks

additionalVulnerability.description: One additional vulnerability to a damage type among: air, bolt, fire, ice.
additionalVulnerability.name: Additional Vulnerability

opposedCheckBonus.description: Gain a bonus to specific Opposed Checks.
opposedCheckBonus.name: Bonus to Opposed Checks

statusImmunities.description: Gain immunity to any two status effects.
statusImmunities.name: Status Immunities

additionalVulnerability.description: One additional vulnerability, preferably opposed to the creatures primary nature.
additionalVulnerability.name: Additional Vulnerability

opposedCheckBonus.description: Gain a bonus to specific Opposed Checks.
opposedCheckBonus.name: Bonus to Opposed Checks

thorns.description: Deal minor damage to melee attackers.
thorns.name: Thorns

additionalVulnerability.description: One additional vulnerability to a damage type among: air, bolt, earth, fire, ice.
additionalVulnerability.name: Additional Vulnerability

undeadHealing.description: Undead may be harmed by healing effects.
undeadHealing.name: Undead Healing

upgradeImmToAbs.description: Upgrade dark immunity to dark absorption.
upgradeImmToAbs.name: Upgrade Immunity to Absorption

areaStatus.description: Cause a status effect on multiple targets.
areaStatus.name: Area Status
areaStatus.spellText: Choose any number of creatures you can see: each of them suffers {status}.

aura.description: Improve M.DEF of up to three targets.
aura.name: Aura
aura.spellText: You project your soul outside your body and direct it to surround the targets, shielding them from dangerous magic. Until this spell ends, each target may treat their Magic Defense as being equal to 12 against any effects that target it (they are still free to use their normal Defense score if higher than 12).

awaken.description: Improve one Attribute of a target.
awaken.name: Awaken
awaken.spellText: You allow a creature to focus their vital energy into accomplishing what they previously could not. Choose one Attribute: Dexterity, Insight, Might, or Willpower. Until this spell ends, the target treats the chosen Attribute as if it were one die size higher (up to a maximum of d12).

barrier.description: Improve DEF of up to three targets.
barrier.name: Barrier
barrier.spellText: You project your soul outside your body and weave it into a barrier to protect the targets from attacks. Until this spell ends, each target may treat their Defense as being equal to 12 against any effects that target it (they are still free to use their normal Defense score if higher than 12).

breath.description: Deal moderate damage to a single target.
breath.name: Breath

cleanse.description: Remove status effects from up to three targets.
cleanse.name: Cleanse
cleanse.spellText: You strengthen and purify the soul energy coursing through your companions. Each target recovers from all status effects.

curseXL.description: Cause two status effects on a single target.
curseXL.name: Curse XL

cursedBreath.description: Cause heavy damage and a status effect on as single target.
cursedBreath.name: Cursed Breath

devastation.description: Cause massive damage to any number of targets.
devastation.name: Devastation
devastation.spellText:
Choose any number of creatures you can see: each of them suffers 30 {damageType} damage. You may only cast this spell once per turn.
This spell should only be given to champion and elite creatures level 30 or higher, and said creatures can only cast this spell during their last turn in the round.

dispel.description: End ongoing effects on a single target.
dispel.name: Dispel
dispel.spellText: You release a wave of negative energy and cleanse all magic from a creature. If the target is affected by one or more spells with a duration of "Scene", they are no longer affected by any of those spells instead.

divination.description: Allow yourself to force a target to reroll a Check.
divination.name: Divination
divination.spellText: You glimpse briefly into the future. Until this spell ends, after a creature you can see performs a Check, if it was not a fumble nor a critical success, you may force that creature to reroll both dice. Once you have forced two rerolls this way, this spell ends.

drainSpirit.description: Cause a single target to loose MP while restoring your own.
drainSpirit.name: Drain Spirit
drainSpirit.spellText: You consume a creature's psyche. The target loses 【HR + 15】 Mind Points. Then, you recover an amount of Mind Points equal to half the Mind Points loss they suffered (if the loss was reduced to 0 in some way, you recover none).

elementalShroud.description: Grant up to three targets Resistance to an elemental damage type.
elementalShroud.name: Elemental Shroud
elementalShroud.spellText: You weave magical energy and protect the targets from the fury of the elements. Choose a damage type: air, bolt, earth, fire or ice. Until this spell ends, each target gains Resistance against the chosen damage type.

enrage.description: Cause multiple targets to suffer Enraged.
enrage.name: Enrage
enrage.spellText: You cause a creature to lose any semblance of temper and act brazenly. The target suffers Enraged and cannot perform the Guard or Spell actions during their next turn.

flare.description: Cause massive fire damage that ignores resistance to a single target.
flare.name: Flare
flare.spellText:
You channel a single ray of fire towards your foe, its temperature so high that it will pierce through most defenses. The target suffers fire damage.
Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.

fulgur.description: Cause heavy bolt damage to multiple targets.
fulgur.name: Fulgur
fulgur.opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers dazed.
fulgur.spellText: You weave electricity into a wave of crackling bolts. Each target hit by this spell suffers bolt damage.

glacies.description: Cause heavy ice damage to multiple targets.
glacies.name: Glacies
glacies.opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers slow.
glacies.spellText: You coat your foes under a thick layer of frost. Each target hit by this spell suffers ice damage.

heal.description: Restore HP of up to three targets.
heal.name: Heal
heal.spellText: You invigorate your companions, soothing their pain and healing their fatigue. Each target recovers {amount} Hit Points.

iceberg.description: Cause massive ice damage that ignores resistance to a single target.
iceberg.name: Iceberg
iceberg.spellText:
A pillar of ice magic envelops your foe, suddenly dropping their body temperature to a critical level. The target suffers ice damage.
Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.

ignis.description: Cause heavy fire damage to multiple targets.
ignis.name: Ignis
ignis.opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers shaken.
ignis.spellText: You unleash a searing barrage against your foes, conjuring flames out of thin air. Each target hit by this spell suffers fire damage.

lifeTheft.description: Deal heavy damage to a single target and heal for part of the damage caused.
lifeTheft.name: Life Theft
lifeTheft.spellText: The target suffers {damageType} damage. Then, you recover an amount of Hit Points equal to half the Hit Point loss they suffered.

lux.description: Cause heavy light damage to multiple targets.
lux.name: Lux
lux.opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers dazed.
lux.spellText: You focus your inner energy into a barrage of blinding soul rays. Each target hit by this spell suffers light damage.

mindTheft.description: Cause heavy damage to a single target, then recover MP.
mindTheft.name: Mind Theft
mindTheft.spellText: The target suffers {damageType} damage. Then, you recover an amount of Mind Points equal to half the Hit Point loss they suffered.

mirror.description: Reflect harmful spells back onto their caster.
mirror.name: Mirror
mirror.spellText: You twist the laws of magic. Until this spell ends, if an offensive () spell is cast on the target, the creature who cast that offensive spell will be targeted in their stead (any other targets of the offensive spell will be targeted as normal). Once that happens, this spell ends.

omega.description: Cause a target to loose HP based on its level.
omega.name: Omega
omega.spellText: You invoke doom on your foe, turning strength into frailty. The target loses an amount of Hit Points equal to 【20 + half the target's level】.

poison.description: Cause multiple targets to suffer Poisoned.
poison.name: Poison
poison.spellText: Each target hit by this spell suffers Poisoned.

quicken.description: Allow a target to use a free attack immediately.
quicken.name: Quicken
quicken.spellText: The target may immediately perform a free attack with a weapon they have equipped (or with a basic attack, if the target is an NPC).

rage.description: Cause multiple targets to suffer Enraged.
rage.name: Rage
rage.spellText: Each target hit by this spell suffers Enraged.

reinforce.description: Make yourself and allies immune to a status effect of your choosing.
reinforce.name: Reinforce
reinforce.spellText: You protect the targets from attacks that would corrupt their body and spirit. Choose dazed, enraged, poisoned, shaken, slow or weak. Until this spell ends, each target becomes immune to the chosen status effect.

shell.name: Shell
shell.spellText: Until this spell ends, you gain Resistance to physical damage.

stop.description: Cause the target to lose an action.
stop.name: Stop
stop.spellText: You trap a foe inside a circle of altered time and space. The target will perform one fewer action on their next turn (to a minimum of 0 actions).

terra.description: Cause heavy earth damage to multiple grounded targets.
terra.name: Terra
terra.opportunity: Each target hit by this spell performs one fewer action on their next turn (to a minimum of 0 actions).
terra.spellText: Spires of jagged rock erupt from the ground beneath your foes, closing around them. Each target hit by this spell suffers earth damage. This spell cannot target creatures who are flying, floating, falling, or otherwise in mid-air.

thunderbolt.description: Cause massive bolt damage that ignores resistance to a single target.
thunderbolt.name: Thunderbolt
thunderbolt.spellText:
You send lightning striking at your foe. The target suffers bolt damage.
Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.

umbra.description: Cause heavy dark damage to multiple targets.
umbra.name: Umbra
umbra.opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers weak.
umbra.spellText: A storm of dark energy turns matter into ash. Each target hit by this spell suffers dark damage.

ventus.description: Cause heavy air damage to multiple targets.
ventus.name: Ventus
ventus.opportunity: Each flying target hit by this spell is forced to land immediately.
ventus.spellText: You summon the power of winds against your enemy. Each target hit by this spell suffers air damage.

warCry.description: Grant a bonus to Accuracy Checks.
warCry.name: War Cry
warCry.spellText: Until this spell ends, each target gains a +1 bonus to Accuracy Checks.

weaken.description: Amplify damage of a chosen type on a single target.
weaken.name: Weaken
weaken.spellText: Until this spell ends, the target suffers 5 extra damage from all sources that deal {damageType} damage.

conditionalBonusSkill.description: Gain an additional skill choice in exchange for a drawback.
conditionalBonusSkill.name: Conditional Bonus Skill

finish.confirm: Check that everything is correct and then press 'Next' to create the Actor.
